entry.sentence: When the two brothers rejoined the ladies for dinner , there was quite a lively tone at the table .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB When)) (S (NP (DT the) (CD two) (NNS brothers)) (VP (VBD rejoined) (NP (DT the) (NNS ladies)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NN dinner)))))) (, ,) (NP (EX there)) (VP (VBD was) (NP (NP (RB quite) (DT a) (JJ lively) (NN tone)) (PP (IN at) (NP (DT the) (NN table))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: advmod(rejoined-5, When-1) det(brothers-4, the-2) num(brothers-4, two-3) nsubj(rejoined-5, brothers-4) advcl(was-12, rejoined-5) det(ladies-7, the-6) dobj(rejoined-5, ladies-7) prep_for(rejoined-5, dinner-9) expl(was-12, there-11) root(ROOT-0, was-12) advmod(tone-16, quite-13) det(tone-16, a-14) amod(tone-16, lively-15) nsubj(was-12, tone-16) det(table-19, the-18) prep_at(tone-16, table-19)

entry.sentence: Frau Ellen chatted cheerfully and laughingly told of the quirks of Countess Rosenberg , who counted every match to her servants and once dismissed a servant because he burned a bale of newsprint instead of selling it .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Frau) (NNP Ellen)) (VP (VP (VBD chatted) (ADVP (RB cheerfully))) (CC and) (VP (ADVP (RB laughingly)) (VBD told) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNS quirks)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (NNP Countess) (NNP Rosenberg)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHNP (WP who)) (S (VP (VP (VBD counted) (NP (DT every) (NN match)) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP$ her) (NNS servants)))) (CC and) (VP (ADVP (RB once)) (VBD dismissed) (NP (DT a) (NN servant)) (SBAR (IN because) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD burned) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN bale)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN newsprint)))) (PP (RB instead) (IN of) (S (VP (VBG selling) (NP (PRP it)))))))))))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nn(Ellen-2, Frau-1) nsubj(chatted-3, Ellen-2) nsubj(told-7, Ellen-2) root(ROOT-0, chatted-3) advmod(chatted-3, cheerfully-4) advmod(told-7, laughingly-6) conj_and(chatted-3, told-7) det(quirks-10, the-9) prep_of(told-7, quirks-10) nn(Rosenberg-13, Countess-12) prep_of(quirks-10, Rosenberg-13) nsubj(counted-16, Rosenberg-13) nsubj(dismissed-24, Rosenberg-13) rcmod(Rosenberg-13, counted-16) det(match-18, every-17) dobj(counted-16, match-18) poss(servants-21, her-20) prep_to(counted-16, servants-21) advmod(dismissed-24, once-23) rcmod(Rosenberg-13, dismissed-24) conj_and(counted-16, dismissed-24) det(servant-26, a-25) dobj(dismissed-24, servant-26) mark(burned-29, because-27) nsubj(burned-29, he-28) advcl(dismissed-24, burned-29) det(bale-31, a-30) dobj(burned-29, bale-31) prep_of(bale-31, newsprint-33) prepc_instead_of(burned-29, selling-36) dobj(selling-36, it-37)

entry.sentence: Rosemarie also had a few episodes to share .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Rosemarie)) (ADVP (RB also)) (VP (VBD had) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS episodes)) (PP (TO to) (NP (NN share))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Fred had already gotten over his dismay of this morning .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Fred)) (VP (VBD had) (ADVP (RB already)) (VP (VBN gotten) (PP (IN over) (NP (NP (PRP$ his) (NN dismay)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT this) (NN morning))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: He was very amused because so was his wife .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP He)) (VP (VBD was) (ADJP (ADJP (RB very) (VBN amused)) (SBAR (IN because) (S (ADVP (RB so)) (VP (VBD was) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN wife))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Magnus Rittner , however , often let his gaze linger obliviously on Rosemary 's face .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Magnus) (NNP Rittner)) (, ,) (ADVP (RB however)) (, ,) (VP (ADVP (RB often)) (VBP let) (NP (PRP$ his) (JJ gaze) (JJ linger) (NN obliviously)) (PP (IN on) (NP (NP (NNP Rosemary) (POS 's)) (NN face)))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: A few times her eyes met his .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT A) (JJ few) (NNS times)) (NP (PRP$ her) (NNS eyes))) (VP (VBD met) (NP (PRP$ his))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(times-3, A-1) amod(times-3, few-2) nsubj(met-6, times-3) poss(eyes-5, her-4) dep(times-3, eyes-5) root(ROOT-0, met-6) dobj(met-6, his-7)

entry.sentence: And there he saw each time a quiet blush rise in her cheeks .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (CC And) (ADVP (RB there)) (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD saw) (NP (DT each) (NN time)) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ quiet) (JJ blush) (NN rise)) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP$ her) (NNS cheeks))))) (. .)))
